where.label: wr1
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( sar <* usedin ( self , 'fabrication_joint_mim.' + 'shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'zone 1' ) ) = 1

where.label: wr2
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( sar <* usedin ( self , 'fabrication_joint_mim.' + 'shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'zone 2' ) ) = 1

where.label: wr3
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( sar <* usedin ( self , 'fabrication_joint_mim.' + 'shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect' ) | sar . relating_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description = 'connection zone' ) ) = 2

where.label: wr1
where.expression: ( ( 'fabrication_joint_mim.' + 'component_terminal' in typeof ( self . related_shape_aspect ) ) and ( self . related_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description in [ 'via terminal' , 'printed component join terminal' , 'non functional land join terminal' , 'land join terminal' , 'conductive interconnect element terminal' , 'component termination passage join terminal' ] ) )

where.label: wr2
where.expression: ( ( 'fabrication_joint_mim.' + 'component_terminal' in typeof ( self . relating_shape_aspect ) ) and ( self . relating_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description in [ 'via terminal' , 'printed component join terminal' , 'non functional land join terminal' , 'land join terminal' , 'conductive interconnect element terminal' , 'component termination passage join terminal' ] ) )
